physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a tall building in the background. There are five flags erected atop the roof of the building. Numerous vehicles are parked in front of the building. Two people who are dressed in uniforms are standing near a truck, on the left hand side of the photograph.
title_text: Cathay Building Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Tall buildings Vehicles Cathay (Organization)
